title: Roseanne Barr, The Best Type of Relations, Gym Etiquette, Tomfoolery, NBA GOAT, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Roseanne Barr, The Best Type of Relations, Gym Etiquette, Tomfoolery, NBA GOAT, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Roseanne Barr made comments leading to the demise of her show. A listener asks Uncle Steve what the best type of sex is. Is there really any locker room etiquette? See what Fool #1 does in his phone prank. The debate is on between Jordan and Bron Bron for GOAT. Today we see what makes Steve exhausted in his Closing Remarks and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
